segments.text: I see the water is already forming a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in it, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will share the cookies with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone should really do something about the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching his limits to reach that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
